full_summary:
----------

## Government Tender Announcement: Transducer, Torque Pressure

### Solicitation Number: T8493-230018/A

#### Publication Date: July 10, 2023

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites bids for a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) to supply a Transducer, Torque Pressure (PN: 3049260-03) for Transport Canada's (TC) Bell 412 aircraft.

#### Tender Closing Date: August 8, 2023, 2:00 PM ET

The RFP is open only to qualified supply arrangement holders for procurement under T8493-140035. The following 28 suppliers are invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* CSO Notified
* Dart Aerospace
* Field Aviation
* Genaire LTD
* Maxcraft Avionics Ltd.
* Szabo Aviation
* Other mentioned companies

The proposed solution must be able to deliver the required Transducer, Torque Pressure and meet the specifications outlined in the RFP documents.

#### Delivery Location:

* Ontario (excluding NCR)

#### End User Entity:

* Transport Canada

#### Contact Information:
Edmond Egikian
Tel: 343-572-4437
Email: [edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

This requirement is part of the comprehensive land claim agreement and does not impact the other tender announcement.

#### Documents

The RFP documents for this tender will be e-mailed directly to the qualified suppliers who are invited to bid on this requirement. The documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Terms and Conditions

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. 

The selection criteria are based on the best value to the Government of Canada. The lowest bid will be selected for the award of the contract. The contract will be awarded based on a fair and transparent process.

#### Project Timeline

The delivery date for this project is August 15, 2023. 

Let me know if there is anything else you need me to do, if so I'll do my best to assist you with your request.  You're all set with this tender announcement.
